title: Menu Browsing - Category Display
description: Verify that the menu categories are displayed correctly on customer homepage and selecting each category shows relevant products.

steps.description: Navigate to the customer homepage.
Verify that all menu categories are visible.
Select each menu category one by one.
Verify products displayed belong only to the selected category.

title: Product Card Display and Info Accuracy
description: Check that each product card displays correct name, image, price, and basic description.

steps.description: Browse products under each category.
Verify product cards show accurate and consistent product information.

title: Product Customization Wizards Functionality
description: Verify all product customization wizards operate correctly and update product preview and price accordingly.

steps.description: Select a customizable product (e.g., pizza) from the menu.
Open the customization wizard.
Make selections for all customizable options.
Verify the product preview and price reflect chosen options.
Repeat for tacos, sandwiches, and other wizard products.
Verify wizard validation and proper handling of invalid inputs.

title: Add to Cart and Cart Updates
description: Verify adding items from product cards and customization wizards updates the cart accurately with correct quantities and prices.

steps.description: Add multiple products including customized items to the cart.
Verify cart shows all items with correct details and total price.
Change the quantity of items and remove items from cart.
Verify cart updates totals and item counts correctly.

title: Order Type Selection and Delivery Zone Mapping
description: Verify customer can select 'Delivery' or 'Pickup' at checkout and delivery zones are displayed correctly on map.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in cart.
Select 'Delivery' order type.
Verify delivery zone map shows correct zones using Mapbox GL.
Select different delivery address locations inside and outside zones.
Validate delivery availability and display appropriate warnings for out-of-zone.
Switch order type to 'Pickup'.
Verify delivery zone map and delivery options are hidden or disabled.

title: Checkout Form Validation and Submission
description: Verify all required customer information fields validate input properly and checkout submission succeeds or fails gracefully.

steps.description: Attempt to submit checkout form with empty required fields.
Verify appropriate validation errors are shown.
Input invalid data (e.g., improper email, phone, address).
Verify form does not submit and shows relevant error messages.
Fill all fields with valid data.
Submit checkout form.
Verify order is successfully submitted and confirmation screen is displayed.

title: Loyalty Rewards Stamp Tracking and Application
description: Verify loyalty program correctly tracks stamps, displays status, and applies rewards during checkout.

steps.description: Add items to cart and proceed to checkout.
View current loyalty stamp status in UI.
Verify stamp count matches user data.
Attempt to apply loyalty rewards at checkout.
Verify discounts or offers are applied correctly to order total.
Complete checkout and verify updated loyalty stamps post-order.

title: Real-time Order Status Updates Across Dashboards
description: Verify order status changes propagate in real-time to customer Ticket Portal, Admin Dashboard, and TV Kitchen Dashboard.

steps.description: Place an order using customer interface.
Verify order appears in Admin and TV Dashboards in pending status.
Update order status (e.g., preparing, ready, completed) on Admin Dashboard.
Verify order status updates are reflected immediately on TV Dashboard and customer Ticket Portal.

title: Admin Dashboard - Order and Product Management
description: Verify admin can view, update order statuses, add/edit products, and configure site settings.

steps.description: Login to Admin Dashboard.
View list of current orders.
Change order status and save.
Verify changes persist and update real-time.
Add a new product with complete details.
Verify product appears in customer menu after saving.
Edit an existing product and save.
Verify updated product details shown correctly.
Modify site settings for order processing.
Verify settings update succeeds and takes effect.

title: Crew Dashboard - System Health and Operations Monitoring
description: Verify crew dashboard shows accurate system health metrics and allows staff operational tasks.

steps.description: Login to Crew Dashboard.
Verify real-time system health metrics are displayed (e.g., backend connectivity, order queue stats).
Perform available operational tasks.
Verify tasks complete successfully and status updates occur.

title: Customer Ticket Portal - Order History and Tracking
description: Verify customers can view full order history and track current orders with live status updates.

steps.description: Login or access Ticket Portal.
Verify past order history is complete and accurate.
Select a current order.
Verify live status tracking updates as order progresses.

title: Progressive Web App (PWA) Features Verification
description: Verify install prompts, offline support, and automatic update notifications function correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the application on a supported browser.
Verify app install prompt is shown under correct conditions.
Simulate offline mode.
Verify offline support is indicated and basic functionality remains.
Trigger application update.
Verify update notification appears and app reloads on user confirmation.

title: Responsive Design Validation
description: Verify application UI layout and elements adapt correctly across multiple screen sizes and orientations.

steps.description: Access the app on desktop with various screen resolutions.
Verify UI elements resize, reposition, and remain readable and accessible.
Access the app on mobile devices (phones/tablets) with both portrait and landscape orientations.
Verify consistent and functional UI layouts with no broken elements.

title: Backend Integration Stability Under Load
description: Verify Supabase backend handles multiple concurrent requests for orders, products, and status updates stably and performs real-time synchronization.

steps.description: Simulate multiple customers placing orders simultaneously.
Verify all orders are processed correctly, status updates propagate in real-time without error.
Perform concurrent admin and kitchen dashboard operations updating orders.
Verify no data conflicts or stale data issues arise.
